summary: I HAVE A 2014 RAM 1500 REG. CAB 2 WHL. DRIVE WITH ONLY 8,300 MILES,   ONCE AND AWHILE WHEN I DRIVE MY TRUCK WHEN I PUT IT IN PARK AND SHUT OFF  MY TRUCK I CANT GET MY KEY OUT IT ONLY GOES TO ACCESSORIES,  I HAVE TO RESTART THE TRUCK PUT IT BACK IN DRIVE  THEN BACK IN PARK SHUT THE TRUCK OFF TO PULL OUT MY KEY...THIS HAS HAPPENED 15 + TIMES.....I AM SURE IF MY TRUCK WAS ON SMALL INCLINE IT WOULD ROLL....LOOKING FOR A RECALL ON THIS BUT NOTHING....ANYBODY ELSE HAVE THIS PROBLEM  THANK YOU
